author: ffang
msg: [SMX4-527] cxf nmr transport should copy over property headers and attachment between cxf message and nmr message

author: lhazlewood
msg: Fixed bug introduced by forcing cookies to default to the root path ('/').  Cookie path defaults to null now, which will use the request's context path.  User-specified explicit paths will of course override this default.

author: mturk
msg: Generate trafficserver-release from PACKAGE_VERSION instead maintaining two separate version data locations

author: sdeboy
msg: Added ability to quickly define color rules for field under mouse pointer in the table as well as for the selected logger in the logger tree (uses default color chooser dialog)
Added support for defining refine focus expressions from the logger tree, and modifying the expression by appending additional logger expressions to the refine focus expression (via OR rules).
Fixed issues preventing welcome tab from correctly hiding if it was set as hidden when Chainsaw was last closed
Added ability to hide zeroconf panel if it was set as hidden when Chainsaw was last closed
Minor UI cleanup - removed drag & drop xml file tab (users can use file-open menu to load the file)
Added 'exception exists' to default error/fatal color rule
Renamed context menu text in an attempt to better describe the feature
